name: Oik Memory 3
description:
New Oik memory challenges you!
As before, you need to remember where 4 to 12 necessary blocks are hidden.
But what do you say if these blocks will move?
You have to solve this puzzle!

  • 50 levels
  • Relaxing music
  • Two game modes:
    - Usual
    - Timer
Music by Trauerbaum

"Oik Memory 3" Powered By Clickteam Fusion 2.5
